page.title: 07St.Mary's Church, Wendover
page.content: St.Mary's Church stands half a mile from the village and probably marks the site of the original settlement. Dating from 13th century, it is built close to the ancient Ridgeway Path and stands in picturesque rural surroundings:- "You come here for happiness. You come here with sadness. You come here for peace..." Recently the villagers have raised money in order to convert part of the East end into a Community Centre where many local residents of all ages can meet and where new clubs, societies and friendships have been formed. "The gentle sound of tolling bells Reminds you of your loved ones. You come here for weddings And you come here for the dead."
